page.title: 18FAMILY LIFE (cont)
page.content: whileothers have only just enough money to feed themselves.This mainly applies to the unemployed. They are payed money but the taxes are too high they find it hard to live on.Some richer people say that the unemployed are just lazy but it is just the lack of jobs. Education is available up to the age of 16 at the least. It is against the law to leave school any earlier. You may stay on at school for another twwo years. Then on to college for further education. Many women,today, also have jobs as well as men but the community is still sexist with women considered not as good as the men eg a lady considering career in mechanics would be considered ridiculous. Some of the most popular books and films are about the future life in
